title: Chocolate and orange mousse cake
description: Joconde is an elaborate technique to imprint decoration in a sponge. Here it is used to to adorn a rich mousse cake.
ingredients: 200g/7oz unsalted butter, softened, plus 15g/½oz butter, melted
180g/6oz pasteurised egg whites, at room temperature
175g/6oz good quality plain chocolate, broken into pieces
300ml/½ pint double cream, whisked to soft peaks
300ml/½ pint double cream, whisked to soft peaks
